lessonTitleText: Peter Heals a Man Who Could Not Walk
lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: What problem did the man at the temple have?
What did Peter say to the man?
answers: In Jesus’ name, stand up and walk
Give me some silver and gold

questions.question: What happened to the man after Peter said these words?
answers: His legs were healed, and he ran and jumped
He floated up into the clouds

questions.question: What did Peter say to the crowd that had gathered?
answers: Jesus has risen! He has healed this man
I healed the man by my own power
The temple has special healing powers
This beggar was pretending he couldn't walk

questions.question: What did the Jewish leaders do to Peter and John?
answers: Asked them to do another miracle

questions.question: How many believers were there after Peter spoke to the crowd?
What did Peter and John tell the Jewish leaders?
answers: Jesus had risen, and His power healed this man
They were only helping a friend

questions.question: What order did the Jewish leaders give to Peter and John?
answers: Do not speak about Jesus anymore

questions.question: What did Peter and John say about this order?
answers: Who should we obey: you or God?
We need more time to decide

questions.question: Before, the disciples ran away in fear. Now they spoke bravely. What changed?
answers: The Holy Spirit was with them
The just decided to be brave
